ta\ d' a)/ll' a)panqh/santa pa/nt' a)pe/pteto:
w(/st' e)sti\ polu\ be/ltista, polu\ dh=t' w)= qeoi/.
ke/rason a)/kraton, eu)franei= th\n nu/xq' o(/lhn
e)klegome/nas o(/ ti a)\n ma/list' o)smh\n e)/xh|.
a)ll' w)= gunai=kes fra/sate/ moi to\n despo/thn,
to\n a)/ndr', o(/pou 'sti/, th=s e)mh=s kekthme/nhs.

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.l: au)tou= me/nous' h(mi=n g' a)\n e)ceurei=n dokei=s.

sp.speaker: *qerapai/na
sp.l: ma/lisq': o(di\ ga\r e)pi\ to\ dei=pnon e)/rxetai.
w)= de/spot' w)= maka/rie kai\ triso/lbie.

sp.speaker: *qerapai/na
sp.l: su\ me/ntoi nh\ *di/' w(/s g' ou)dei\s a)nh/r.
ti/s ga\r ge/noit' a)\n ma=llon o)lbiw/teros,
o)/ntwn to\ plh=qos ou) dedei/pnhkas mo/nos;

sp.speaker: *qerapai/na
sp.l: nh\ th\n *)afrodi/thn polu/ g' a(pa/ntwn u(/statos.
o(/mws d' e)ke/leue sullabou=sa/n m' h( gunh\
a)/gein se kai\ tasdi\ meta\ sou= ta\s mei/rakas.
kai\ ta)/ll' a)gaqa/. pro\s tau=ta mh\ bradu/nete,
kai\ tw=n qeatw=n ei)/ tis eu)/nous tugxa/nei,
kai\ tw=n kritw=n ei) mh/ tis e(te/rwse ble/pei,
i)/tw meq' h(mw=n: pa/nta ga\r pare/comen.

sp.speaker: *ble/puros
sp.l: kai\ mh\ paralei/yeis mhde/n', a)ll' e)leuqe/rws
e)gw\ de\ pro\s to\ dei=pnon h)/dh 'pei/comai:
e)/xw de/ toi kai\ da=|da tauthni\ kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta diatri/beis e)/xwn, a)ll' ou)k a)/geis
tasdi\ labw/n; e)n o(/sw| de\ katabai/neis, e)gw\
smikro\n d' u(poqe/sqai toi=s kritai=si bou/lomai.

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.l: toi=s sofoi=s me\n tw=n sofw=n memnhme/nois kri/nein e)me/,
toi=s gelw=si d' h(de/ws dia\ to\n ge/lwn kri/nein e)me/:
sxedo\n a(/pantas ou)=n keleu/w dhladh\ kri/nein e)me/,
mhde\ to\n klh=ron gene/sqai mhde\n h(mi=n ai)/tion,
o(/ti proei/lhx': a)lla\ pa/nta tau=ta xrh\ memnhme/nous
mh\ 'piorkei=n a)lla\ kri/nein tou\s xorou\s o)rqw=s a)ei/,
mhde\ tai=s kakai=s e(tai/rais to\n tro/pon proseike/nai,
ai(\ mo/non mnh/mhn e)/xousi tw=n teleutai/wn a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *xoro\s
sp.l: <w)=> fi/lai gunai=kes, ei)/per me/llomen to\ xrh=ma dra=n,
e)pi\ to\ dei=pnon u(papokinei=n. krhtikw=s ou)=n tw\ po/de
